title: Write a Human-Interest Feature
description: A reporter needs to write a long-form feature story about a local hero, focusing on narrative and character development.

tasks.description: Review all interview transcripts and notes to find compelling anecdotes and quotes.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies the most powerful storytelling elements from the research.

tasks.description: Outline a narrative structure for the story, with a clear beginning, middle, and end.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a logical and engaging story arc.

tasks.description: Draft the feature story, using descriptive language to paint a picture of the person and their experiences.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent writes an engaging, well-crafted feature article.
